title: Thyrotoxicosis: selection of treatment (D)
creator_contributor_role: University of Glasgow Television Service, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Medicine - Study and teaching

description: Examines the use of drugs in the treatment of thyrotoxicosis and compares it wit h other forms of therapy. Concludes that the drug therapy is to be preferred bec ause it does the least damage and has the lowest morbidity. This view is supported by diagrammatic explanations. Intended for medical students, hospital physicians and GPs.
